QuestData.Title: Give 'em What-For
QuestData.Description: Alright, $n, listen up. I know a thing or two about troggs, and one of those things is that the biggest, strongest troggs get the most respect. The brutes value strength over anything else.$b$bYe see those great big troggs sitting back behind the front lines? They're the closest they have to what ye'd call a leader. Go take out a few, and show 'em what it means to mess with the Sons of Ironforge!
QuestData.RewardText: Hmm... they blame us for destroying their home, ye say? Well, that wasn't us, that was the horrible earthquake we had earlier today. Are they that dense that they can't see we nearly lost our camp too?$b$bCan't blame a trogg for fightin' for his home, though.
